column4: today when i booted up my nautilus freezes each time i answer a dialog box, "move to trash", "replace"  etc, is this a known problem ??
may be a problem with permissions

when i delete a file and press delete in the dialog, nautilus freezes, after i start nautilus again the file is deleted. so its not a permissin problem on the files as i see it, could i be another place?
i can't tell but i think it's best to delete all nautilus related configuration files and see if it helps
